problem.p: Assume we want to make different colored cupcakes using out brand new cooking machines, which of the following is the best example of Generalization for the cupcake task?

choicegroup.choice: Using a different machine for each cupcake
Using a different machine for each color of cupcake
Choosing only our two favorite colors and using two different machines for each color of cupcake

div.p: Our goal is to produce any color of cupcake we want the fastest and simplest way possible. The third option doesn't satisfy our goal at all. The first choice is just too tedious and expensive. The second choice seems to be the best, because it is less times consuming and simpler that the rest of the choices.
